response.overview: Rare Douglas P blue movie.  Douglas from Death in June taking a leading role in this suburban romp. Was released originally on DVD titled 'Vignettes' in 2006 from a site called Mature Aussie.  From the sellers website via wayback machine ..  " Vignettes DVD (2006) - US$65 (+$1.5 Service Fee)  More of the men you like to see... chubby, straight blokes having hot sex.  This DVD contains 112mins of pumping action... non stop. ( running time 112 minutes )"  Film was uploaded onto an adult streaming site, the video titled 'End of The Road'.
response.tagline: Death in June's Douglas P. as you have never seen him before!
response.title: End of the road
